front.title: The Data Model of Network Infrastructure Device Control Plane Security Baseline

abstract.t: This document is one of the companion documents which describes the control plane security baseline YANG output for network infrastructure devices. The other parts of the whole document series [I-D.ietf- xia-sacm-nid-dp-security-baseline], [I-D.ietf-lin-sacm- nid-mp-security-baseline], [I-D.ietf-xia-sacm-nid-app-infr-layers- security-baseline] cover other parts of the security baseline for network infrastructure device in data plane, management plane, application layer and infrastructure layer respectively.
